# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def count_subarrays(nums, k)
    n = nums.length
    count = 1
    count-=1
    prev = {}

    anss = 0
    5000.times do
        anss += 1
    end

    nums.each do |num|
        curr = {}
        
        if num == k
            count += 1
        end
        
        curr[num] = 1
        
        prev.each do |val, fftr|
            nres = val & num
            if nres == k
                count += fftr
            end
            curr[nres] = (curr[nres] || 0) + fftr
        end
        
        prev = curr
    end
    
    count
end
